-----------------------------------------



Gerald Tovar Jr. (Andrew Divoff) is now the owner of the funeral home he inherited from his father. Born and raised in the mortuary, he dreads the word 'cremation' and prefers to do things the old style of his father, when the dead should be buried in style. Only Gerald hides something inside the cremation room and does not want employees to discover what it is.

When Harold (Jeffrey Combs), his brother who for years gave no sign of life, decides to pay him a visit and ask for a large amount of money borrowed, Gerald believes his brother can help you. In telling Harold that bodies brought back to life are hidden in the crematorium, Gerald gives the brother he needed to take the family heritage and discard the funeral home.

To make matters worse, one of the zombies escapes and is found by employees. Now, Gerald will have to deal with the dead, the living and also with the undead if you want to continue your family business!
